I'm building myself an assistant because I don't feel like writing myself.
Talking in tiny chunks through a screen ‚Äî what is this even for? I went to journalism school, didn't finish, didn't get it back then, and I still don't get it now.
Let my machine do the understanding for me.
SoloBuddy ‚Äî a companion that watches your commits and pushes you to write about them publicly.
You connect your repo, it sees what's happening, throws post ideas at you.
It doesn't write for you, but gives you a solid starting point.
Just to be clear ‚Äî I'm not making a "partner".
I'm making a minimal inner hustler (though of course you can twist the system prompt however you want).
There's one insight I want to share, but I'll only reveal it after I get 10 followers.
That's my version of build in public.
